amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the environmental review process in the bill will not apply to oil and gas leasing activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part A of House Report 108-540 to clarifies that the environmental review processes in H.R. 4513 do not apply to oil and gas leasing activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Pombo.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
